City Council
============

Council and Mayor Foyer
-----------------------

Meetings
--------

* 7:00 PM
* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of each month
* Council Chambers  
  500 S. Oak Street  
  Roanoke, TX 76262

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[Most Recent Agenda](https://www.roanoketexas.com/121/Agendas-Minutes) | [View All Agendas and Minutes](https://roanoketexas.com/121/Agendas-Minutes)| [View Archives](https://roanoketexas.com/agendacenter)

Members
-------

Scooter Gierisch
----------------

[Scooter Gierisch](mailto:scooter@roanoketexas.com) - Mayor, Term expires May 2027
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Holly Gray-Moore[Holly Gray](mailto:HGray@roanoketexas.com) - Mayor Pro Tem ,Ward 1, Term expires May 2026
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hogan Page[Hogan Page](mailto:hpage@roanoketexas.com) - Council Member Ward 1, Term expires May 2027
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Brian Darby[Brian Darby](mailto:bdarby@roanoketexas.com) - Council Member Ward 2, Term expires May 2026
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bryan Moyers[Bryan Moyers](mailto:bmoyers@roanoketexas.com) - Council Member Ward 2, Term expires May 2027
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

David Brundage[David Brundage](mailto:dbrundage@roanoketexas.com) - Council Member Ward 3, Term expires May 2026
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

David Thompson[David Thompson](mailto:dthompson@roanoketexas.com) - Council Member Ward 3, Term expires May 2027
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Members of the City Council are elected for 3-year terms on a nonpartisan basis. The City Council is made up of 7 members, with 2 council members elected from each of the [city’s 3 wards (PDF)](https://www.roanoketexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/2120/Roanoke-Ward-Map_2018 "city’s 3 wards ") and the mayor elected at large.   

Attending Meetings
------------------

Citizens are welcome to attend council meetings and may speak during public input. If you wish to speak at a council meeting, please fill out the [public input form](https://roanoketexas.com/FormCenter/City-Secretary-4/Public-Meeting-Appearance-Form-57) and submit online.
